name: Idaho State University Department of Dance - Capoeira
notes: Pocatello, Idaho. Paul Zmolek teaches modern, ballet, Capoeira, movement, choreography. Professor Josephine Garibaldi teaches modern, Capoeira, devising, production, choreography (garijose@isu.edu, [208] 282-6143). SOURCE: www.isu.edu 4/23/16
